docna.cdata!:
Ethiopia - Coffee Processing Project :
            Credit 0290 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Ethiopia - Coffee Processing
            Project : Credit 0290 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include:
            construction of about 100 new coffee washing stations,
            improvement to about 100 existing stations, construction of
            about 400 km of dry weather access roads, and technical
            services for the preparation of follow-up projects, for a
            survey of the coffee economy, and research into improved
            coffee grading and management practices.
